articles.author: Tom Lutz
articles.title: Megan Rapinoe slams ‘deep misogyny’ in Spanish football after president’s kiss - The Guardian
articles.description: Megan Rapinoe says forward Jenni Hermoso was ‘physically assaulted’ by the Spanish football president after the team’s World Cup victory
articles.content: Megan Rapinoe attacked the deep level of misogyny and sexism in the Spanish football federation after its president, Luis Rubiales, kissed forward Jenni Hermoso on the lips after her teams victory in… [+8017 chars]

articles.author: Charles Bradley
articles.title: Andretti announces Ericsson deal, Grosjean's IndyCar future in doubt - Autosport
articles.description: Marcus Ericsson is to make the switch to Andretti Autosport from Chip Ganassi Racing for next year’s IndyCar season, casting further doubt on the future of Romain Grosjean.
articles.content:
Andretti confirmed the deal on Wednesday, which means the 2022 Indianapolis 500 winner will join Colton Herta and Kyle Kirkwood next season.
It also means that current Andretti driver Grosjean will … [+2260 chars]

articles.description: Fans, women’s groups and ex-players slam the way Man Utd conducted an investigation into allegations against the player.
